title: How to Put Music Onto a PS3

steps.headline: Get your MP3 player or memory stick
Download the desired songs onto your MP3 player or USB memory stick
When finished, take out your MP3 player/stick.
Insert your MP3/stick into your PS3, (use the right hand USB port on a 2 USB port model)
Go to your MP3 player in that tab (or USB device..if there is nothing but playlist then use a different USB stick)
Then, copy all of the songs that you want to put onto your PS3.
steps.description: To do that, press 'triangle' on your selected song(s) and press 'X'.

steps.headline: When you've finished that, go back to the original 'Music' tab.
If you want to put them into a playlist (group), go to 'playlist' and press 'X'
Go to 'Create New Playlist' and press 'X'.
When you have done that, put all the songs that you want into the playlist.
steps.description: To do that, go to the song(s) you want and press 'Triangle'.

tyn: Some sort of MP3 song downloader(USB cord for MP3 - Internet or anything that has a USB connecter)
text: Get your MP3 player or memory stick  Insert it into your computer.  Download the desired songs onto your MP3 player or USB memory stick  When finished, take out your MP3 player/stick.  Insert your MP3/stick into your PS3, (use the right hand USB port on a 2 USB port model)  Go to the 'Music' tab  Go to your MP3 player in that tab (or USB device..if there is nothing but playlist then use a different USB stick)  Press 'triangle'  Go to display all.  Then, copy all of the songs that you want to put onto your PS3. To do that, press 'triangle' on your selected song(s) and press 'X'. When you've finished that, go back to the original 'Music' tab.  If you want to put them into a playlist (group), go to 'playlist' and press 'X'  Go to 'Create New Playlist' and press 'X'.  Enter the playlist's name.  When you have done that, put all the songs that you want into the playlist. To do that, go to the song(s) you want and press 'Triangle'. Press 'Add to Playlist.'  You're done!
sentences: Get your MP3 player or memory stick  Insert it into your computer.
Download the desired songs onto your MP3 player or USB memory stick  When finished, take out your MP3 player/stick.

Insert your MP3/stick into your PS3, (use the right hand USB port on a 2 USB port model)  Go to the 'Music' tab  Go to your MP3 player in that tab (or USB device..if there is nothing but playlist then use a different USB stick)  Press 'triangle'  Go to display all.
Then, copy all of the songs that you want to put onto your PS3.
To do that, press 'triangle' on your selected song(s) and press 'X'.
When you've finished that, go back to the original 'Music' tab.
If you want to put them into a playlist (group), go to 'playlist' and press 'X'  Go to 'Create New Playlist' and press 'X'.
When you have done that, put all the songs that you want into the playlist.
To do that, go to the song(s) you want and press 'Triangle'.
